page.title: 11 STONE MASONRY
page.content: {Mr. de la Mare}lives at La Cachette, Pleinmont, and he is a{stone mason. He starts work at 8 o'clock and finishes at 5 o'clock. Here is a list of things he has done in the past. {Fireplaces, arches, namestones, and {gravestones.}He makes the shapes for graves with special tools and heavy hammers. He gets the stones from the {quarry}or France. He takes one day to make one namestone. He has to go to the quarry and collect stones that have been blasted, then he takes them home and cuts them. He has done this job for 20 years. These are the three different types of{lettering}he uses on the namestones and gravestones. They are called{script, old English {and univers.}He chisels these out and then paints with gold, black or white paint. By{Rebecca Le Lievre. }
